data.title: Discovery Elementary School
data.text:
Don’t forget! Next week, April 15 through 19, is spring break for all PSD students. There is no school and district offices are closed to the public.

Enjoy a week off and we’ll see you Monday, April 22!

Read More about Spring Break is April 15 to 19, 2024

Welcome, Kindergartners! Online kindergarten registration for the 2024-2025 school year is now open. Registering early allows you to find out about all of the transition activities we have planned in the spring and summer!

Go to psd401.net/registration to begin the online process. Welcome Class of 2037!

Read More about 2024-2025 Kindergarten Registration Now Open

In honor of Martin Luther King Jr. Day, there is no school on Monday, January 15, and district offices will be closed. Enjoy your weekend!

Read More about Schools Closed Monday, January 15 in Honor of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day

As the stormy season is upon us, we wanted to share a reminder of Peninsula School District's procedures and expectations during inclement weather and school closures. You can also find this information, as well as Emergency Snow Routes, on our website at psd401.net/transportation.

Read More about Plan Ahead for Possible Inclement Weather

Reminder, all Peninsula School District schools and offices will be closed from Thursday, December 21 through Tuesday, January 2.

On Wednesday, January 3, school resumes with late start. Have a great winter break!

Read More about Winter Break is Dec. 21 through Jan. 2

Impact your child’s learning by completing the 2023-24 Federal Impact Aid survey.

A quick survey that takes five minutes to fill out can generate thousands of dollars in funding for textbooks, materials, hiring staff and educators and more military student support.

All parents who have children enrolled in the Peninsula School District received a Parent Square message inviting them to complete the survey.

Read More about Please complete the 2023-24 Federal Impact Aid survey
